project_descr: The regional project entitled “Reducing UPOPs and Mercury Releases from the Health Sector in Africa” aims to implement best environmental practices and introduce non-incineration healthcare waste treatment technologies and mercury-free medical devices.

outputs.output_descr: The objective of the project implemented by UNDP in partnership with WHO and Health Care Without Harm, is to implement best environmental practices and introduce non-incineration healthcare waste treatment technologies and mercury-free medical devices.

document_name: UNDP-IRH-ITB-2017-06 Provision of Healthcare Waste Management Equipment
UNDP-IRH-RFQ-2017-05- Provision of Mercury Free Medical Devices
project_title: upops and mercury releases from health sector in africa
